findings.title: Public Function could be Declared External (L01)
findings.description: Public function could be declared external.

findings.title: Blacklisted Contracts (BC)
findings.description: Contract owner can stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: CO - Code Optimization
findings.description: Code segments could be optimized for smaller size, less memory consumption, faster execution, or fewer operations.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: The contract is using variables before their declaration.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are uninitialized variables defined in the local scope.
